mapper.sql: sys_id, order_no, entity_id, user_id, appointment_cates, related_no, appoint_date, time_from, time_to, address, status, institution_id, department_id, service_option, appraisal, is_cancelled, creation_time, create_by, edit_time, edit_by
mapper.select:
select ufd.user_id, ub.head_image, ub.full_name,-- 姓名 ub.gender,-- 性别 TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, ub.date_of_birth, CURDATE()) AS user_age, se.entity_name, ufd.effect_to, ub.is_hr, ufd.order_no, se.entity_id from user_family_doctor as ufd LEFT JOIN user_basic as ub ON ub.user_id=ufd.user_id LEFT JOIN user_entity_mapping as uem ON uem.user_id=ub.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_entity as se On se.entity_id=uem.entity_id
where ufd.doctor_no=#{params.relatedNo} and ufd.status=2

SELECT ub.full_name, ub.gender, ub.head_image, oa.is_cancelled, oa.order_no, oa.address, oa.appoint_date, om.amount, FLOOR(DATEDIFF(now(), ub.date_of_birth)/365.2422) age FROM order_appointment oa LEFT JOIN user_basic ub on oa.user_id = ub.user_id LEFT JOIN order_main om on om.parent_no = oa.order_no LEFT JOIN exam_handover_sheet ehs on ehs.order_no = oa.order_no where oa.related_no = #{params.nurseNo} and om.is_deleted = 0 and (om.order_cates = 1 or om.order_cates = 3)
and ehs.person_barcode_confirmed = 0 AND ehs.draw_completed = 0 AND ehs.is_handovered = 0 and oa.is_cancelled = 0
and ehs.person_barcode_confirmed = 1 AND ehs.is_handovered = 0 and oa.is_cancelled = 0
and oa.is_cancelled = 1
and ehs.person_barcode_confirmed = 1 AND ehs.draw_completed = 1 AND ehs.is_handovered = 1 and oa.is_cancelled = 0
AND YEARWEEK(date_format(oa.creation_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now())
AND DATE_FORMAT(oa.creation_time, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m')
AND to_days(oa.creation_time) = to_days(now())
mapper.update: update user_family_doctor SET status=2 WHERE order_no=#{orderNo}
mapper.select: select ufd.user_id, ub.head_image, ub.full_name,-- 姓名 ub.gender,-- 性别 TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, ub.date_of_birth, CURDATE()) AS user_age, ub.id_card_no,-- 身份证号 uc.card_no,-- 医保卡号 se.entity_name, ufd.effect_to, ub.is_hr, ufd.order_no, se.entity_id from user_family_doctor as ufd LEFT JOIN user_basic as ub ON ub.user_id=ufd.user_id LEFT JOIN user_entity_mapping as uem ON uem.user_id=ub.user_id LEFT JOIN user_cards as uc ON ub.user_id = uc.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_entity as se On se.entity_id=uem.entity_id where ufd.user_id=#{userId} and ufd.status=2 UNION select eha.user_id, ub.head_image, ub.full_name,-- 姓名 ub.gender,-- 性别 TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, ub.date_of_birth, CURDATE()) AS user_age, ub.id_card_no,-- 身份证号 uc.card_no,-- 医保卡号 se.entity_name, eed.effect_to, ub.is_hr, eha.order_no, se.entity_id from entity_healthy_appointment as eha LEFT JOIN user_basic as ub ON ub.user_id=eha.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_entity as se ON se.entity_id=eha.entity_no LEFT JOIN user_cards as uc ON ub.user_id = uc.user_id LEFT JOIN entity_exclusive_doctor as eed ON eed.doctor_no=eha.related_no WHERE eha.user_id=#{userId} and eha.status=1

select err.byh, err.report_no,-- 报告编号 err.review_no,-- 解读人 ub.user_id,-- 用户编号 ub.head_image,-- 头像 eir.BRXM,-- 报告人 eir.BRXB,-- 性别 eir.BRNL,-- 年龄 eir.BGLX,-- 报告类型 -- ,-- 项目名称 eir.SHSJ,-- 报告生成时间 err.status-- 报告状态 FROM exam_report_review as err LEFT JOIN exam_inspect_report as eir ON err.report_no=eir.report_no LEFT JOIN user_basic as ub ON ub.user_id=SUBSTRING_INDEX(err.byh,'^',-1) WHERE ub.user_id=#{params.userId}
mapper.update: update order_appointment SET is_cancelled=#{isCancelled} WHERE order_no=#{orderNo}
mapper.select: SELECT oa.sys_id, oa.order_no, oa.entity_id, oa.user_id, oa.address, oa.appointment_cates, oa.appoint_date, oa.status, si.`name` institutionName, oa.institution_id, oa.is_cancelled, oa.related_no, oa.service_option, oa.time_from FROM order_appointment oa LEFT JOIN sys_institution si on si.institution_id = oa.institution_id WHERE oa.order_no = #{params.orderNo} and oa.is_cancelled = 0

SELECT oa.order_no, oa.appoint_date, oa.address, sd.cellphone_no,
ub.full_name as userName, ub.gender as userSex, ub.id_card_no as userIdCard, ub.cellphone_no as userPhone, (SELECT card_no from user_cards where user_id=ub.user_id) as userDoctorCard,
ur.relative_name as relatedName, ur.gender as relatedSex, ur.id_card_no as relatedIdCard, ur.cellphone_no as relatedPhone, (SELECT card_no from user_cards where user_id=ur.relative_id) as relativeDoctorCard
from order_customer as oc LEFT JOIN user_basic as ub ON ub.user_id=oc.relative_id LEFT JOIN user_relatives as ur ON ur.relative_id=oc.relative_id LEFT JOIN order_appointment as oa ON oa.order_no=oc.order_no LEFT JOIN sys_doctor as sd ON sd.doctor_no=oa.related_no WHERE oa.order_no=#{orderNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM order_appointment WHERE order_no = #{orderNo}

select om.sys_id, oai.option_1, om.status, ub.full_name, ub.gender, ub.id_card_no, uc.card_no, ub.cellphone_no, oa.address, oa.appoint_date, om.order_time, om.amount, om.order_no , om.user_channel from order_appointment as oa LEFT JOIN order_additional_info as oai ON oai.order_no=oa.order_no LEFT JOIN order_main as om ON om.order_no=oa.order_no LEFT JOIN user_basic as ub ON ub.user_id=om.user_id LEFT JOIN user_cards as uc ON uc.user_id=ub.user_id where oa.order_no=#{orderNo}
